/mosquitto/data.description: Choose a Share for mosquitto's data. E.g.: create a Share called mosquitto for this purpose alone.
/mosquitto/data.label: Data Location

UID.description: Enter a valid UID to run mosquitto as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
UID.label: UID to run mosquitto as.

GID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
GID.label: GID to run mosquitto as.
